Text:
[V]Listen, Lord, and have mercy, for we have sinned against you.
[R]Hear us, Christ, have mercy, and answer our prayers.
[V]Listen, Lord, to the prayers crying out to you.
[R]Hear us, Christ, have mercy, and answer our prayers.
[V]Glory to the Father, to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit.
[R]Hear us, Christ, have mercy, and answer our prayers.
